channel.title: Can som1 help me with hamachi?
channel.description:
sometimes i can go on a server throught hamachi but i dont really understand how it works. i dont know if im just soposto click on a server link and then log on on moparscape.
theres a little green dot nexto the server thing i want to go on, on hamachi? do i press it? :confused: :confused: :confused: help????

item.title: Can som1 help me with hamachi?
item.dc:creator: @KingCjownz KingCjownz
item.description:
@KingCjownz wrote:

The green Dot means that the person/network is online and if theres no dot it means its offline.

  • Ham is for wireless servers , if you want to just go on a server and its says no-ip ip and ham ip it wont matter becoz you still connect to the same server.

Read full topic
item.source: Can som1 help me with hamachi?

item.title: Can som1 help me with hamachi?
item.dc:creator: @justlikers justlikers
item.description:
@justlikers wrote:

it is like a on-screen router, it connects you to the internet temporarly, to get onto another persons server you go to the triangle and click “join a network” and join the server netwrok, then ak them to tell you the ip (if it isnt posted were ever you found the server advert.) and then make sure the port is right (that should be posted also) then you can get in

Read full topic
